preqs: Students must have completed one of the following units: AFC2131, ACC2131, ACC2200

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ACB3021, ACC3131, ACF3200, ACF3431, ACG3021, ACW3021, AFC3131, AFF3431, AFG3021, AFW3021}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACC2131, ACC2200, AFC2131} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 41, 50}

description: This unit focuses on the provision and use of management accounting information for management planning and control in organisations. Technical and behavioural issues related to budgeting, variance analysis, performance measurement, and value chain management are considered.
